cpl.readme:
\define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) for the Editor toolbar that inserts a timestamp.
Adapt the date/time format - `<>` in $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/timestamp - to your liking.
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/timestamp}}
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/timestamp-button
